info.title: ChartSense API
info.description: Technical analysis stock trading API with automated trading bot

get.description:
Get real-time quote for a stock symbol.
Uses Alpaca (unlimited) as primary source.

Get historical price data for a stock.
Uses Alpaca (unlimited) as primary source.

Search for stock symbols by keyword.
Uses Alpaca (unlimited) as primary, Alpha Vantage as fallback.

Get company fundamentals and overview.
Uses Alpha Vantage (limited to 25 calls/day on free tier).

Get real-time (latest) quote with forced fresh data.
Bypasses any caching and fetches directly from Alpaca.

Get status of data sources and their capabilities.
Useful for debugging data freshness issues.

post.description:
Force refresh chart data for a symbol.

This endpoint:
1. Clears any server-side cache for the symbol
2. Fetches fresh data directly from Alpaca
3. Returns the latest 100 candles with timestamps

Use this when:
- Charts appear stale or frozen
- Data timestamps don't match current time
- You need to verify data freshness

Args:
    symbol: Stock symbol (e.g., AAPL) or crypto (e.g., BTC/USD)
    interval: Candle interval (1min, 5min, 15min, 1hour, 1day)

get.description: Get all symbols in the watchlist with enriched data

post.description: Add a symbol to the watchlist

delete.description: Remove a symbol from the watchlist

get.description: Check if a symbol is in the watchlist
Calculate RSI (Relative Strength Index) for a symbol
Calculate MACD for a symbol
Calculate Simple Moving Average

Get a summary of all technical indicators for a symbol.

Uses Alpaca for price data (unlimited API calls).

Get comprehensive AI-generated insight for a stock.
Uses multiple technical indicators to generate actionable recommendations.

Get AI insights for multiple trading timeframes.

Returns analysis for:
- Scalp (1-15 min): Quick trades, RSI extremes, MACD momentum
- Intraday (1h-4h): Day trading, trend following
- Swing (1D-1W): Multi-day holds, trend direction
- Long-term (Weekly+): Position trading, 200 SMA trend

A stock can be BUY for scalping but HOLD for long-term.

Alexander Elder's Triple Screen Trading System Analysis.

This methodology uses three "screens" across different timeframes:
- Screen 1 (Daily): Determine the "tide" - overall market direction
- Screen 2 (1-Hour): Identify the "wave" - pullbacks or consolidations
- Screen 3 (5-Minute): Pinpoint the "ripple" - precise entry timing

The system aligns long-term trends with short-term entries for higher probability trades.
Ideal for SMR and similar stocks with multi-timeframe dynamics.

Get timeframe-adaptive indicators based on the active chart interval.

Short-Term/Intraday (1m, 5m, 15m):
- Focus: Momentum & Breakouts
- Indicators: VWAP, ADX/DI, RSI (fast), Support/Resistance

Long-Term/Swing (1h, 1d, 1w):
- Focus: Trend & Structure
- Indicators: 50/200 SMA, RSI, MACD, Volume Profile

Get stock recommendations for watchlist/trading.
Scans popular stocks and returns ranked opportunities.

Get adaptive technical indicators with mode-specific parameters.

The adaptive engine automatically adjusts indicator periods and thresholds
based on the selected trading mode (scalp, intraday, swing) or can auto-detect
the optimal mode based on current market volatility.

parameters.name: mode

schema.description: Trading mode: scalp, intraday, or swing
schema.title: Mode

parameters.description: Trading mode: scalp, intraday, or swing

parameters.name: auto_mode

schema.description: Auto-detect optimal mode based on volatility
schema.title: Auto Mode

parameters.description: Auto-detect optimal mode based on volatility

post.description:
Set the trading mode for the adaptive indicator engine.

Modes:
- scalp: Short timeframes, tight stops, quick trades (high volatility)
- intraday: Same-day positions, moderate risk (moderate volatility)
- swing: Multi-day holds, wider stops (low volatility)

parameters.name: mode

schema.description: Trading mode: scalp, intraday, or swing
schema.title: Mode

parameters.description: Trading mode: scalp, intraday, or swing

get.description: Get the current adaptive indicator engine configuration.

Get current trading bot status.

Returns bot state, uptime, last trade time, and current activity.

post.description:
Start the trading bot.

Optionally override paper trading mode and enabled symbols.
The bot runs in the background and can be monitored via /status.

Stop the trading bot.

Stops the trading loop but keeps existing positions open.
Use /positions/close-all to close all positions.

Pause the trading bot.

Pauses trading (no new positions) but continues monitoring existing positions.
Resume the trading bot from paused state.

get.description: Check bot health and connectivity.

Get execution log for debugging paper trade failures.

Shows why trades were or weren't executed.

Get trace of last N 'Strong Buy' signals to diagnose execution failures.

Paper Trading Troubleshooting:
1. Balance & Allocation: Check if paper account has enough buying power
2. Order Type Mismatch: Check if AI is sending market orders when limit required
3. Spread Filter: Check if spread threshold is too tight
4. Signal Expiry: Check if signals are stale by execution time
5. API Permissions: Ensure paper trading API keys have trade permission

post.description:
Toggle pause on new position entries.

When paused, bot continues monitoring existing positions but won't open new ones.

Override the trading strategy.

Args:
    strategy: 'conservative', 'moderate', 'aggressive', or None to reset

Enable or disable automatic trade execution.

When enabled, the bot will automatically execute trades when signals meet thresholds.
When disabled, the bot will only detect signals and report them (manual trade approval required).

Args:
    enabled: True to enable auto-trading, False to disable. If None, toggles current state.

get.description: Get current auto-trade mode status.

post.description:
Emergency close all positions immediately.

WARNING: This will close ALL open positions at market price.

get.description:
Get current priority tier distribution for symbols.

Shows which symbols are in HIGH/STANDARD/LOW priority tiers.

post.description:
Set the asset class mode for hybrid scanning.

Args:
    mode: 'crypto' for crypto only, 'stocks' for stocks only, 'both' for hybrid

When set to 'both' (hybrid mode):
- Stocks are scanned during regular market hours
- Crypto is scanned 24/7
- Both asset classes are monitored when market is open

get.description:
Get current scan progress for both stocks and crypto.

Returns real-time scan status, current symbol being analyzed,
best opportunities found, and market status.

Get recent bot activity log.

Returns recent actions, decisions, and events from the trading bot.

Run comprehensive system diagnostic.

Checks:
- API connections (Alpaca, Alpha Vantage)
- Chart data freshness (1m timestamps)
- System time sync
- Account status and permissions

Returns detailed diagnostic report with pass/fail status for each check.

Get detailed execution error summary from the ExecutionLogger.

Returns error codes, frequency, and recent failures to help
diagnose why trades aren't executing.

Get detailed trading performance metrics.

Endpoint: /api/bot/performance/metrics

Args:
    period: Time period - '1D', '1W', '1M', '3M', 'ALL'

Returns comprehensive metrics including:
- Win rate, profit factor, Sharpe ratio
- Max drawdown, expectancy
- Today's P&L and performance

Get equity curve data for charting.

Endpoint: /api/bot/performance/equity-curve

Args:
    period: Time period - '1D', '1W', '1M', '3M', 'ALL'

Returns list of equity points for drawing the portfolio equity curve.

Get quick performance summary for the bot header.

Endpoint: /api/bot/performance/summary

Get the current status of the hierarchical trading strategy.

Returns:
- Current trading horizon (SWING, INTRADAY, SCALP)
- Daily goal progress
- Scan statistics
- Best current opportunity

Endpoint: /api/bot/hierarchical/status

post.description:
Enable or disable the hierarchical trading mode.

When enabled:
- Bot uses intelligent cascading: SWING -> INTRADAY -> SCALP
- Adapts to market conditions automatically
- Aims to find profitable opportunities every trading day

When disabled:
- Bot uses traditional single-mode scanning

Endpoint: /api/bot/hierarchical/toggle?enabled=true

Set the daily profit target for the hierarchical strategy.

The bot will track progress toward this daily goal and adapt its
trading horizon based on how close it is to achieving it.

Args:
    target_pct: Daily profit target percentage (0.1% to 5.0%)

Endpoint: /api/bot/hierarchical/set-daily-target?target_pct=0.5

get.description:
Get all current trading opportunities from the hierarchical scanner.

Returns opportunities organized by horizon (SWING, INTRADAY, SCALP)
with full analysis details including:
- Pattern detection (Bull Flags, H&S, etc.)
- Elliott Wave position
- Multi-timeframe confluence
- Entry/exit levels

Endpoint: /api/bot/hierarchical/opportunities

post.description:
Force the bot to focus on a specific trading horizon.

This overrides the automatic cascading logic and forces the bot to
only look for opportunities in the specified horizon.

Useful when you have strong conviction about market conditions.

Args:
    horizon: SWING, INTRADAY, or SCALP

Endpoint: /api/bot/hierarchical/force-horizon?horizon=SCALP

parameters.name: horizon

schema.description: Force a specific horizon: SWING, INTRADAY, or SCALP
schema.title: Horizon

parameters.description: Force a specific horizon: SWING, INTRADAY, or SCALP

get.description:
Get detailed progress toward the daily profit goal.

Returns:
- Target percentage
- Achieved percentage
- Trades taken today
- Win/loss count
- Best and worst trade
- Horizons used today

Endpoint: /api/bot/hierarchical/daily-goal
Get account summary with equity, cash, and P&L.

Get all current open positions (stocks AND crypto).

Returns positions from Alpaca with our strategy metadata.
Get a specific position by symbol.

post.description:
Close a position (sell shares).

If quantity is not specified, closes the entire position.

Close all open positions.

WARNING: This will sell all shares in all positions.

get.description:
Get quick performance summary.

Args:
    period_days: Number of days to analyze (default 30)

Get detailed performance metrics.

Includes win rate, profit factor, Sharpe ratio, max drawdown, and more.

Args:
    period_days: Number of days to analyze (default 30)

Get equity curve data for charting.

Returns chronological list of equity values and P&L.

Args:
    period_days: Number of days to include (default 30)

Get paginated trade history.

Args:
    page: Page number (default 1)
    page_size: Number of trades per page (default 20)
Get a specific trade by ID.
Get history of self-optimization changes.

post.description:
Manually trigger self-optimization cycle.

Analyzes recent performance and applies parameter adjustments.

get.description:
Get post-mortem analysis for a specific trade.

If analysis doesn't exist, it will be generated automatically.
Includes:
- Trade summary and metrics
- What went well / What went wrong
- Optimal exit analysis
- Lessons learned
- AI-generated summary (if OpenAI configured)

post.description:
Force re-analysis of a specific trade.

Regenerates the post-mortem analysis even if one exists.
Useful after updating AI models or wanting fresh insights.

get.description:
Get summary of all trades for a specific day.

Args:
    date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to today)

Get comprehensive weekly performance report.

Includes:
- Win/loss statistics
- P&L breakdown
- Performance by symbol
- Performance by exit reason
- AI-generated insights (if OpenAI configured)
Get current bot settings.

put.description:
Update bot settings.

Changes are applied immediately if the bot is running.

post.description: Reset settings to defaults.

get.description: Get available configuration presets.

post.description: Apply a configuration preset.

get.description:
Get current trading mode (paper or live).
Also returns account info to show which mode is active.

post.description:
Switch between paper and live trading mode.

WARNING: Switching to live mode will use real money!

get.description:
Get AI-powered analysis for a stock.

Uses OpenAI GPT to analyze technical indicators and provide
trading recommendations with confidence scores.

Discover promising stocks to trade using AI.

Returns a list of stock recommendations based on current market
conditions and the specified risk tolerance.

schema.title: Response Discover Stocks Api Ai Discover Get

get.description:
Get AI analysis of overall market sentiment.

Returns bullish/bearish/neutral sentiment with confidence
and sector recommendations.
Check if AI advisor is enabled and working.
Get all stocks in user's personal watchlist

schema.title: Response Get User Watchlist Api Stocks Bot Watchlist Get

post.description: Add a stock to user's watchlist - bot will prioritize these

delete.description: Remove a stock from user's watchlist

patch.description: Toggle auto-trade setting for a watchlist stock

get.description:
Get stocks from the bot's repository.

Args:
    active_only: Only return active stocks
    tradeable_only: Only return stocks meeting entry criteria
    source: Filter by source (USER, AI_DISCOVERED, PERFORMANCE)

schema.title: Response Get Stock Repository Api Stocks Bot Repository Get

post.description: Add a stock to the bot's repository

delete.description: Remove a stock from the repository

patch.description: Update a stock's priority (1-10, higher = more priority)
Toggle active status for a repository stock

get.description: Get statistics about the stock repository

post.description:
Bot submits a ticker as a promotion candidate.
Called by the trading bot when it discovers a high-confidence opportunity.

get.description: Get all pending promotion candidates for user review

post.description:
User makes a decision on a promotion candidate.
Can approve/reject and optionally add to watchlist.

get.description: Get promotion history
Get current promotion settings

post.description: Update promotion settings

delete.description: Dismiss a promotion candidate without adding to watchlist

post.description: Bulk approve all candidates meeting confidence threshold

get.description: Get list of supported cryptocurrencies

Get real-time quote for a cryptocurrency.

Args:
    symbol: Crypto symbol like "BTC/USD" or "BTCUSD"
Get quotes for all default watchlist cryptos
Get historical bars for a cryptocurrency
Get all current crypto positions

post.description:
Place a cryptocurrency order.

Note: This places real orders on your Alpaca account (paper or live).

get.description:
Get technical analysis for a cryptocurrency.

Returns signals, indicators, and trading recommendation.
Check crypto market status (always open 24/7)
Debug endpoint to test Alpaca crypto API connection

Perform multi-timeframe analysis on a stock.

Analyzes daily and weekly timeframes to find confluence.
Higher confluence = stronger signal.

Detect chart patterns for a stock.

Identifies patterns like:
- Head & Shoulders
- Double Top/Bottom
- Triangles
- Candlestick patterns (Doji, Hammer, Engulfing, etc.)

Get Elliott Wave analysis for a stock.

Elliott Wave Theory identifies 5-wave impulse patterns and 3-wave corrective patterns.
Returns current wave position, confidence, and Fibonacci-based price targets.

Get support and resistance levels for a stock.

Identifies key price levels based on historical pivot points and price clustering.
Returns levels sorted by strength.

Get trend lines for a stock.

Calculates support and resistance trend lines using linear regression on pivot points.

Get sentiment analysis for a stock.

Analyzes news articles and provides bullish/bearish sentiment score.
Get news sentiment breakdown for a stock
Get overall market fear/greed index
Get upcoming earnings dates

Check if a stock has upcoming earnings.

Returns risk level and recommendation for trading around earnings.
Get important economic events
Get current market hours status for stocks and crypto
Get list of available backtest strategies

post.description:
Run a backtest on historical data.

Returns performance metrics including:
- Total return
- Win rate
- Profit factor
- Max drawdown
- Sharpe ratio

get.description:
Get comprehensive portfolio risk analysis.

Includes sector exposure, correlation risk, and diversification score.

Get notification history.

Returns the most recent notifications sent by the bot.

Get notification service status.

Shows whether email notifications are configured and enabled.

post.description:
Send a test notification to verify configuration.

Use this to test that email notifications are working.
